channel.title: Count Matrix on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in Count Matrix on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis – Post 3: Data Import & Preprocessing
item.description: Bridge the gap between theory and practice by mastering RNA-seq data import and preprocessing. Discover step-by-step workflows for creating DESeqDataSet objects, handling different input formats, and performing essential quality checks before analysis.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 6: From BAM to Count Matrices with featureCounts & HTSeq
item.description: Generate RNA-Seq count matrices with featureCounts and HTSeq. Learn about annotation matching, strandedness, sorting, and best practices for accurate read quantification.
